title: IDE-SHEPHERD
description: This dashboard provides insights into IDE-SHEPHERD events.

definition.content:
[IDE-SHEPHERD](https://github.com/DataDog/IDE-SHEPHERD-extension) is an VS Code/Cursor security extension designed to monitor extensions and workspaces in real-time for malicious activity. 

This dashboard offers a comprehensive overview of IDE activities, extensions lifecycles and reported security events.

For more information, see IDE-SHEPHERD [documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/ide-shepherd/).

**Tips**

-   Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
-   Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: VS Code Alerts Per Flagged Technique
